statements: SELECT * FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM historical_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM historical_events WHERE event_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM historical_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%war%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM historical_events;
SELECT * FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_events WHERE event_name LIKE 'World%';
SELECT event_name, category_name FROM historical_events INNER JOIN event_categories ON historical_events.event_id = event_categories.category_id;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%World War%' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, event_name, ec.category_name FROM historical_events he JOIN event_categories ec ON he.event_id = ec.category_id ORDER BY event_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM historical_events GROUP BY event_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY event_count DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT ec.category_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM historical_events he JOIN event_categories ec ON he.event_id = ec.category_id GROUP BY ec.category_name HAVING event_count > 1 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name FROM events WHERE event_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events JOIN event_categories ON events.event_id = event_categories.event_id WHERE event_categories.category_name = 'Music';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT e.event_name, h.description FROM events e JOIN historical_dates h ON e.event_id = h.event_id WHERE h.event_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY h.event_date;
SELECT e.event_name, ec.category_name FROM event_categories ec JOIN events e ON ec.event_id = e.event_id WHERE ec.category_name = 'Sport' ORDER BY e.event_name;

SELECT e.event_name, h.description, ec.category_name FROM events e JOIN historical_dates h ON e.event_id = h.event_id JOIN event_categories ec ON e.event_id = ec.event_id WHERE h.event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ec.category_name;

SELECT e.event_name, ec.category_name FROM events e LEFT JOIN event_categories ec ON e.event_id = ec.event_id WHERE e.event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ec.category_name DESC, e.event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM people WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, name FROM events JOIN event_participants ON events.id = event_participants.event_id JOIN people ON event_participants.person_id = people.id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT events.event_name, locations.location_name FROM events INNER JOIN locations ON events.id = locations.id;

SELECT people.name, events.event_date FROM people INNER JOIN event_participants ON people.id = event_participants.person_id INNER JOIN events ON event_participants.event_id = events.id ORDER BY events.event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location_name FROM events, event_locations WHERE events.id = event_locations.id;
SELECT event_name, category_name FROM events JOIN event_categories ON events.id = event_categories.id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location_name FROM events JOIN event_locations ON events.id = event_locations.id;
SELECT participant_name, event_name FROM event_participants JOIN events ON event_participants.event_id = events.id ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, category_name, tag_name FROM events JOIN event_categories ON events.id = event_categories.id JOIN event_tags ON events.id = event_tags.id;
